title: Special counsel asks judge to keep Trump from disclosing evidence in documents case
description: Special counsel Jack Smith has asked the judge overseeing former President Trump's classified documents case to impose a protective order over the evidence in the case.

title: 9 charged in thefts of Yogi Berra rings, Warhol and Pollock paintings: Feds
description: The alleged heists spanned over 20 years and included the theft of championship rings, paintings, trophies and more, federal prosecutors said.

title: Boston rape accuser condemns suspect's release on bail: 'I'm in disbelief'
description: Matthew Nilo is accused of raping three women and sexually assaulting a fourth in a violent spree in 2007 and 2008. He pleaded not guilty and was released on bail.

title: Demolition crew saves abandoned litter of baby raccoons in Utah
description: A demolition crew rescued an abandoned litter of baby raccoons from the site of a home they were tearing down earlier this week

title: Donald Triplett, the 1st person diagnosed with autism, dies at 89
description: The Mississippi man known as “Case 1,” the first person to be diagnosed with autism, has died

title: 1 person killed in bear attack in Arizona; bear also dead
description: A person was killed in a bear attack in Arizona on Friday, authorities said.

title: NCAA medical committee recommends removal of marijuana from banned drug list
description: An NCAA medical committee is recommending the removal of marijuana from its banned drug list and whether drug-testing should be limited to performance-enhancing substances

title: Japan raises sexual consent age to 16 from 13, which was among the world's lowest
description: Japan’s parliament has raised the age of sexual consent to 16 from 13, a limit which had remained unchanged for more than a century and was among the world’s lowest, amid calls for greater protection of children and women

title: Pentagon Papers whistleblower Daniel Ellsberg dead at 92
description: Daniel Ellsberg, the military analyst who became infamous for leaking the Pentagon Papers to news outlets in 1971, has died, according to his family.

title: Donald Trump's relentless attacks on special counsel Jack Smith
description: "He's a raging and uncontrolled Trump-hater," he's said.

title: 6 dead, including 3 children, in murder-suicide
description: Six people, including three children, were found dead in a Tennessee home in what officials said was a domestic situation gone bad.

title: Jayland Walker family files lawsuit against city of Akron, police officers
description: Jayland Walker's family has filed a lawsuit against the city of Akron and members of the Akron Police Department.

title: Pattern of unlawful policing in Minneapolis made Floyd murder 'possible,' DOJ finds
description: A DOJ investigation finds pattern of discriminatory, unlawful policing in Minneapolis "made what happened to George Floyd possible."

title: Pittsburgh synagogue mass shooter found guilty in federal death penalty trial
description: Robert Bowers has been convicted in the killing of 11 worshippers in a mass shooting at a Pittsburgh synagogue.

title: NBA suspends Ja Morant 25 games for latest social media incident involving a gun
description: Memphis guard Ja Morant has been suspended for the first 25 games of the upcoming season for his second known incident of displaying what appeared to be a firearm on social media

title: 'Lottery lawyer' sentenced to 13 years for swindling clients out of $107M
description: Jason Kurland was convicted of taking $103 million from clients.

title: African leaders kick off peace mission to Ukraine
description: A delegation of African Leaders has arrived in Ukraine, kicking off the African Peace Initiative Mission in a bid to find a peaceful resolution for the war in Ukraine.

title: Iowa Supreme Court prevents 6-week abortion ban from going into effect
description: The court was split in a 3-3 decision on the case, meaning abortion remains legal in Iowa.

title: Trump again argues Manhattan hush-money trial should be moved to federal court
description: Former President Donald Trump tried again in a new court filing to get his criminal prosecution in New York moved to federal court.

title: Man charged after telling police he shot himself in leg during dream about intruder
description: A suburban Chicago man faces firearm charges after police say he told officers he accidentally shot himself in the leg while dreaming that an intruder was breaking into his home

title: WATCH:  Emotional reunion as man finds brother alive among shipwreck survivors
description: A Syrian man had an emotional reunion after finding his 18-year-old brother amongst the survivors of a shipwreck off Greece that killed at least 79 people this week.

title: Biden will mark the anniversary of a gun safety law signed after Uvalde massacre
description: President Joe Biden will speak at a summit in Connecticut to mark the first anniversary of a gun safety law signed after the Uvalde, Texas, school massacre

title: Final day of search for missing migrants in Greece; hundreds feared dead
description: Greece’s coast guard has launched its final day of searching an area of the Mediterranean Sea where a large fishing boat packed with migrants sank

title: $930 million in grants announced in Biden's effort to expand internet access
description: The federal effort to expand internet access to every U.S. home has taken a major step forward with the announcement of $930 million in grants to shore up connections in dozens of places where significant connectivity gaps persist

title: African leaders set to meet with presidents of Ukraine, Russia in bid to end war
description: African leaders and senior officials are seeking ways to end Russia's war.

title: ‘Father was killing everyone’: 3 brothers shot and killed, mother injured in shooting
description: Three young brothers – aged just 7, 4 and 3-years-old – have allegedly been shot and killed by their father and their mother has been wounded at a home in Ohio.

title: Pope Francis leaves Rome hospital 9 days after having surgery for abdominal hernia
description: Pope Francis leaves Rome hospital 9 days after having surgery for abdominal hernia and scarring

title: Devastating tornado tears through Texas town, 3 dead, more than 50 injured
description: Twenty million Americans from Kansas to Florida are on alert Thursday for severe weather, including tornadoes, intense wind and huge hail.

title: Devastating tornado tears through Texas town, at least 3 dead, 100 injured
description: Twenty million Americans from Kansas to Florida are on alert Thursday for severe weather, including tornadoes, intense wind and huge hail.

title: Tornado watches issued in South as severe weather outbreak continues: Latest
description: Twenty million Americans from Kansas to Florida are on alert Thursday for severe weather, including tornadoes, intense wind and huge hail.

title: Westchester County DA ends probe of Trump golf course without filing charges
description: The district attorney in Westchester County, New York, has closed a two-year investigation into former President Trump without filing charges.
